{{Infobox battle item |name = Wonder Chest |image = [[File:Wonder Chest.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Wonder Chest''. |price = 10,000 {{pdollar}} |location =
*[[Wonder Chest#Shops|Shops]] }} == Description == The '''Wonder Chest''' is a type of held item that can be equipped to any Pokémon. == Details == Increases EXP gained of the Pokémon holding the item by 15%. == Acquisition == ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Johto: Locations & Items|Violet City]]|10,000 {{pdollar}}}} |} |} {{Held Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Held Items]]
revision.comment: Updating to match new version of source page
